newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Quickturn cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Quickturn cut to hold.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist analyst Doug van Dorsten cut his rating on shares of Quickturn Design Systems Inc to hold from strong buy after the company pre-announced a first quarter earnings shortfall.
-- In a statement, van Dorsten said he cut his 1997 earnings estimate to $0.19 a share from $0.95 a share and his revenue estimate to $108.6 million from $130.1 million.

-- van Dorsten said the changes in his rating and estimates were caused by the "unexpected slowdown in growth" for emulation systems. Also, he noted increased competition has caused longer evaluation times for products.
